# Security Policy

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Please do not open public issues for suspected security vulnerabilities.

Preferred: use GitHub’s private vulnerability reporting for this repository (Security tab → “Report a vulnerability”), which notifies maintainers privately.

If private reporting is not available for this repository, contact the maintainers privately using the contact method listed in the repository description or README.

## Supported Versions

Security fixes are applied to:
- the default branch (`main`)
- the latest tagged release (if any)

Older tags may not receive security backports.
